name: Hero Rush (BrandonLeDev)
description:
A final project created during my time in University.

Hero Rush is a simple infinite-scroller and boss rush hybrid game. The player will start each level playing an infinite scroller, collecting power-ups and avoiding the boss that is continually attacking the player. Once the player collects enough power-ups, they can attempt to challenge the boss head on. The stage is considered complete once the player defeats the boss.

Play with WASD and clicking the icons on the bottom left to use the skills (3rd skill only available during boss phase). Note: The game was originally designed for mobile.
